name: 'SKATE' BLUE
description: Currently only shipping to Canada and USA, we will be offering global shipping again soon, sign up for updates above. Our Skateboard sunglasses edition is here! Each pair is handcrafted from durable 7 ply Canadian maple skateboards! We know you'll agree that they fit as good as any plastic pair you own! Remember, with EVERY item ordered, GROWN will pay for sight-restoring eye surgery for 1 person or diagnostic eye examinations for 12 children! It will also help to sponsor eye camps in remote locations around the globe. For Smaller faces or teens, you may want to look at our Lil' Kick style. • STYLE: 'SKATE' • SIZE: 53-20-139 • MATERIAL: Strong & Sustainable 5 ply maple skate decks • COLOR: Blue stain with red, brown and natural inner layers • HINGES: German Silver Spring Hinges for a snug and secure fit. • LENSES: Flat grey with European Conforming (CE) UV 400 (100% UVA/UVB) infused Polarizing Filters. Further information can be found on the FAQ's Page. GROWN Proudly offers a 100 day Warranty Flat Shipping Rates: USA & CAN $10 Gift Certificates are now Available!

name: 'KICKER' ZebraWood Wayfarer
description:
Currently only shipping to Canada and USA. The Zebrawood 'Kickers' are our most popular style and the Zebrawood grain pattern is very sought after. In the past few years this interest has led to a higher than normal global demand for Zebrawood, and this may eventually cause undesired stress on the species.
Due to our ongoing commitment to create only positive change in the World, we will be Discontinuing all Zebrawood styles once current wood stock is gone. We are currently seeking suitable and sustainable replacement materials. As always we will still fund sight-restoring eye surgery for 1 person or eye examinations for 12 Children for every item ordered! • STYLE: 'Kicker' with distinctive wedge-shape arms & raised bridge. • SIZE: 53-22-138 Total face width of 144mm. • MATERIAL: ZebraWood (lighter than plastic) • COLOR: Natural Zebra Pattern Wood Grain • HINGES: German Silver Spring Hinges for a snug and secure fit. • LENSES: Brown Gradient European Conforming (CE) UV 400 (100% UVA/UVB) lenses with infused Polarizing Filters. For Smaller faces or teens, you may want to look at our Lil' Kick style. Further information can be found on the FAQ's Page. GROWN Proudly offers a 100 day Warranty Flat Shipping Rates: USA & CAN $10 Gift Certificates are now Available!

name: 'ORIGINAL' Natural Bamboo
description: Currently only shipping to Canada and USA. The 'Original' Grown sunnies come with a smooth face and classic temple. They have two silver studs on the face and are available in two lens color options. And of course, with EVERY item ordered, GROWN will fully fund sight-restoring eye surgery for 1 person or testing for 12 children! For Smaller faces or teens, you may want to look at our Lil' Kick style. • STYLE: 'Original' with standard shape arms, smooth face and silver star pins. • SIZE: 52-21-140 Total face width of 144mm. • MATERIAL: Durable & Sustainable Bamboo (lighter than plastic) • COLOR: Natural Bamboo • HINGES: German Silver Spring Hinges for a snug and secure fit. • LENSES: Brown Fade (gradient) or Gold Reflective. Both are European Conforming (CE) UV 400 (100% UVA/UVB) lenses with infused Polarizing Filters. Further information can be found on the FAQ's Page. GROWN proudly offers a 100 day Warranty Flat Shipping Rates: USA & CAN $10 Gift Certificates are now Available!

name: 'Lil' Kick' Stained Bamboo
description: Currently only shipping to Canada and USA. A slightly smaller version of our most popular style the 'Kicker', the 'Lil' Kick' is best suited for those with smaller faces or preferences (Generally a good fit on ages 5-14, though some adults wear them). Carved & ready to go, the 'Lil' Kick' will get LOTS of attention! And of course, with EVERY item ordered, GROWN will pay for sight-restoring eye surgery for 1 person or diagnostic eye-examinations for 12 children! For a slightly larger size, you may want to look at our Stained Bamboo Kicker style. • STYLE: 'Lil' Kick' with distinctive wedge-shape arms & raised bridge. • SIZE: 46-19-136 Total face width of 128mm. • MATERIAL: Bamboo (lighter than plastic) • COLOR: Lightly Stained Bamboo • HINGES: German Silver Spring Hinges for a snug and secure fit. • LENSES: Brown Gradient (fade) with European Conforming (CE) UV 400 (100% UVA/UVB) lenses with infused Polarizing Filters.
